displayName.text: MAISON 10 - GIFT STORE AND ART GALLERY

formattedAddress: 4 W 29th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: MAISON 10 - GIFT STORE AND ART GALLERY

adrFormatAddress: 4 W 29th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Really cool gallery, right next to the Ace Hotel. They switch out the art displayed every 10 weeks with art from different artists. The owner is very nice and took the time to get to know us. They also sell some candles and other small pieces of art. Something for everyone who appreciates a good vibe! And 10% of your purchase gets donated to a charity of your choice (they provide a list you can choose from). Looking forward to going back next time I'm in the city.

originalText.text:
Run, do not walk, to this darling shop. Thoughtfully curated collections, beautifully displayed. Henri was warm and welcoming, and Tom, with whom I interacted only briefly, was gregarious and uplifting.

I was a little nervous that I‚Äôd be rushed or feel like I was wasting his time, but Henri was fully present, knowledgable and answered my questions about the different (marvelous!) scents they had featured.

Felt like I was walking into the home of the coolest people you know, made all the cooler by their kindness and expertise. I can‚Äôt wait to visit again!

originalText.text: This place is amazing! Fantastic collection of art and fun items for sale, all curated with love and care. This has become my go-to place when I want to shop for a thoughtful gift.

text.text: This place is amazing! Fantastic collection of art and fun items for sale, all curated with love and care. This has become my go-to place when I want to shop for a thoughtful gift.

originalText.text: There aren‚Äôt enough words for how amazing Maison 10 is- it‚Äôs a true neighborhood gem in an otherwise fairly touristy part of town, but Tom and Henri know all of the locals (and their dogs!) by name. They have the best tips for sneaky amazing local spots for a bite and a tipple, and they truly have something for everyone in their amazing space. We‚Äôve bought beautiful artwork & jewelry, been to such special events like their comedy night and artist talks, and we always buy our perfumes/colognes, candles, and incense here. What strikes me is even if it‚Äôs not an event night, I always know I‚Äôll have good conversations with anyone who‚Äôs inside the doors and that the time I spend here always lifts me up. Big love to Tom and Henri for building this amazing community in the heart of Manhattan üíóüíóüíó

originalText.text:
I love their incense, one in particular.... Tom and Henri are the kindest people..I have to say. I hadn't been to the city in about 5yrs. So when I went back, I made it a point to visit with Tom and make a purchase. With that visit, I met Henri.
Also with that visit, we cleaned him and Henri out of my favorite incense.

If you're looking for eclectic pieces of art or furniture, floor lamps, candles, jewelry. This is your place to visit as well as perfumes and cologne.

They both met my husband and sister with her family.
Maison 10 also donates 10% to certain charities. You get to pick the charity of your choice.

I love that Maison 10 gives back to these charities. Too many to name and remember.

Thank you Tom and Henri for welcoming my family and myself again.

When I'm back in the city, I'll visit with you both again.

Both of you stay safe, remain healthy and happy.

Deniseüòò‚ù§Ô∏èüòò‚ù§Ô∏è
